module Alarm.DB.Keys (fullEncode, fullDecode, buildEncodedKeyText, routeKeyFcn, routeKeyFcnWith, fullDecodeKey, fullDecodeSrc, fullDecodeDest, fullDecodeDateTime, buildAlarmKeyDest, encodeDirectedKeyRaw,decodeDirectedKeyRaw,makeDirectedKeyRaw, buildSingleRouteMap, getDestFcnWith) where

-- import Alarm.DB.Keys.Internal
import           Alarm.DB.Keys.Types
import           Control.Applicative  ((<$>))
import qualified Data.Aeson           as A
import qualified Data.ByteString      as B
import qualified Data.ByteString.Lazy as LBS
import qualified Data.Map             as M
import           Data.Monoid
import           Data.Serialize
import           Data.Text (Text, pack)
import qualified Data.Text.Encoding   as TE
import           DirectedKeys
import           DirectedKeys.Router
import           DirectedKeys.Types
import           Prelude

-- | KeyRoute Building Function
keyRouteConfToList :: Functor f => f KeyRouteConf -> f (LBS.ByteString, String)
keyRouteConfToList krcfs = (\krcf -> (A.encode $ krKey krcf, krDes krcf)) <$> krcfs

buildSingleRouteMap :: [KeyRouteConf] -> M.Map LBS.ByteString String
buildSingleRouteMap krconfs = M.fromList $ (\k-> ((A.encode $ krKey k), (krDes k))) <$> krconfs

-- | Function to route the entity Key to its coresponding Dest
getDestFcn :: (Monoid b, Ord b, Ord a) => [(a, b)] -> a -> Maybe b
getDestFcn krc = let krlt = (DirectedKeys.Router.fromList krc)
              in  makeDestFcn krlt


-- | Function to route the entity Key to its coresponding Dest
getDestFcnWith :: (Monoid b, Ord b, Ord a) => [(a, b)] -> M.Map a b -> a -> Maybe b
getDestFcnWith krc m = let krlt = (fromListWithMap krc m)
                      in makeDestFcn krlt

-- | Function to encode a toJSON AlarmId, AlarmKeyconf, a list of KeyRouteConf to a  Maybe Text Key
fullEncode :: LBS.ByteString -> AlarmKeyConf -> KeyRouteMap -> Maybe Text
fullEncode naId almKeyConf krConfs = destUrl >>= (\dt -> return $ buildEncodedKeyText (AlarmKeyAId (LBS.toStrict naId)) (src almKeyConf) (dt) (AlarmKeyTime 1398738268))
  where destUrl = buildAlarmKeyDest $ routeKeyFcnWith naId krConfs

routeKeyFcn :: LBS.ByteString -> [KeyRouteConf] -> Maybe String
routeKeyFcn naId krconfs = (getDestFcn $ keyRouteConfToList krconfs) naId

routeKeyFcnWith :: LBS.ByteString -> KeyRouteMap -> Maybe String
routeKeyFcnWith naId krMap = getDestFcnWith (keyRouteConfToList . krconfList $ krMap) (srkmap krMap) naId

buildAlarmKeyDest :: Maybe String -> Maybe AlarmKeyDest
buildAlarmKeyDest destString = destString >>= (\dString -> return $ AlarmKeyDest $ SText $ pack $ dString)

-- | Decode Function
fullDecode :: AlarmKey -> Either Text (DirectedKeyRaw AlarmKeyAId AlarmKeySrc AlarmKeyDest AlarmKeyTime)
fullDecode  = fullDecodeb.fullDecodea

fullDecodea :: AlarmKey -> Text
fullDecodea = almKey

fullDecodeb :: Text -> Either Text (DirectedKeyRaw AlarmKeyAId AlarmKeySrc AlarmKeyDest AlarmKeyTime)
fullDecodeb = decodeDirectedKeyRaw

-- | Decode Function for each field in DirectedKeyRaw
fullDecodeKey :: AlarmKey -> Either Text B.ByteString
fullDecodeKey = (fmap (almKeyAId . getSimpleKey) ) . fullDecode

fullDecodeSrc :: AlarmKey -> Either Text Text
fullDecodeSrc = (fmap (unSText . almKeySrc . getSource) ) . fullDecode

fullDecodeDest :: AlarmKey -> Either Text Text
fullDecodeDest = (fmap (unSText . almKeyDest . getDest) ) . fullDecode

fullDecodeDateTime :: AlarmKey -> Either Text Int
fullDecodeDateTime = (fmap (almKeyTime . getDateTime) ) . fullDecode

-- | Use AlarmKeyAId, AlarmKeySrc, AlarmKeyDest, and AlarmKeyTime to make a Encoded Text Key
buildEncodedKeyText ::  AlarmKeyAId -> AlarmKeySrc -> AlarmKeyDest -> AlarmKeyTime -> Text
buildEncodedKeyText aId asrc adst tm = TE.decodeUtf8 $ encodeKey $ (DKeyRaw aId asrc adst tm)

-- | Function to Make a DirectedKeyRaw
makeDirectedKeyRaw :: B.ByteString -> Text -> Text -> Int -> DirectedKeyRaw AlarmKeyAId AlarmKeySrc AlarmKeyDest AlarmKeyTime
makeDirectedKeyRaw aId asrc adst tm = DKeyRaw { getSimpleKey = AlarmKeyAId aId
                                              , getSource = AlarmKeySrc. SText $ asrc
                                              , getDest = AlarmKeyDest .SText $ adst
                                              , getDateTime = AlarmKeyTime tm }

-- | Encode and Decode DirectedKey Raw functions
encodeDirectedKeyRaw :: (Serialize key, Serialize source, Serialize destination, Serialize datetime) => DirectedKeyRaw key source destination datetime -> Text
encodeDirectedKeyRaw akey = TE.decodeUtf8 $ encodeKey $ akey

decodeDirectedKeyRaw :: Text -> Either Text (DirectedKeyRaw AlarmKeyAId AlarmKeySrc AlarmKeyDest AlarmKeyTime)
decodeDirectedKeyRaw akey =  case (decodeKey $ TE.encodeUtf8 $ akey) of
                       Left e -> Left $ pack e
                       Right r -> Right r
